name: Guy Wheeler
description:
A little game we made for the Game Maker's Toolkit game jam!

The theme is: Out of control.

Play as an old man who just broke out from the hospital, this man is out of control... literally. He won't accomplish much without you.

Help him out on his journey by placing objects around, which each comes with their own special perk.

Players can't directly control the protagonist. Instead, place special objects around, set the stage and hit "START. Watch the old man roll.

Hope you like it, let us know what you think!

CONTROLS:

Select stuff with mouse

Space = Start

R = Respawn the old man

CREDITS:

Programming: @Agelvik

Art: @Art_Zamori

Music: Rolemusic, http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/
